lexUnit.name: son-in-law.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: the husband of a person's daughter

sentence.text: Similarly , the Shias have disputed the leadership of Islam with the Sunnis since the eighth-century murder of Ali , the son-in-law of the Prophet .
